official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to conduct an inspection of the Buckeye Lake Dam and levee, Buckeye Lake, Ohio, to determine its structural stability.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to inspect the Buckeye Lake Dam and levee, Ohio, and to report to Congress and the Ohio Department of Natural Resources concerning the safety of such dam and levee.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to conduct an inspection of the Buckeye Lake Dam and levee, Buckeye Lake, Ohio, to determine its structural stability.
